tag_list: dada-net, buongiorno, play-me, dada-entertainment, sony-music-entertainment, appsfuel, ntt-docomo
overview:
Max currently serves as Chairman and CEO of Dada.net, the company acquired by Buongiorno S.p.A in June 2011. Buongiorno is a leading international provider of mobile web premium entertainment services. In July 2012 Buongiorno S.p.A. has been acquired by NTT Docomo. Max Pellegrini plays a key role in both managing the Company North American market and the Global development of a new product offering around mobile web apps. In addition, he is the CEO of Dada Entertainment, that was initially created as a joint venture between Dada and Sony BMG Music Entertainment in October 2007 and Max was appointed then as the initial CEO.

Before joining Dada in May 2000, Pellegrini worked for Andersen Consulting (now Accenture), where, as a Senior Manager in the Strategic Services Division, he specialized in the planning and integration of complex programs of organizational change. In AC he worked with clients operating in the oil and chemistry industry and the utility sector specializing in Internet Economy as the General Manager of a start-up company held by AC.

Massimiliano Pellegrini graduated from the University of Florence majoring in Business Administration, lives in NYC and is father of 2.

He also serves as a Member in:

  • at&t Advisory Board for Developers
  • MEF Americas Board of Directors
